chunk: Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil *, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, BrassicAbyssinica (Abyssinian) Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Swertia Chirata Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Naringenin, Panthenyl Triacetate, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Cetearyl

chunk: Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Swertia Chirata Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Naringenin, Panthenyl Triacetate, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Squalane, Isopropyl Palmitate, Lecithin. *Organic
book: 1792-Epicuren Discovery DEFY AGE CORRECTIVE FACIAL OIL

chunk: Directions: Apply each morning and/or evening over entire face, neck, and décolleté by warming a few drops into the palm of your hands and massaging onto cleansed and toned skin. It may be used alone or under your moisturizer.
book: 1792-Epicuren Discovery DEFY AGE CORRECTIVE FACIAL OIL

chunk: Warnings: Some of Epicuren®'s products are manufactured in a facility that uses gluten, non-vegan ingredients, iodine, nuts, kernels, and nut-derived products. Because of this, it is possible that cross- contamination can occur.
book: 1792-Epicuren Discovery DEFY AGE CORRECTIVE FACIAL OIL

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
